title: IGNITE-11110 fixed stop case with collision SPI enabled.
IGNITE-13865 Support  DateTime as a key or value in .NET and Java
body:
Currently, .Net type `DateTime` can't be used as a key or value in the cache in a way that Java will read values in `java.util.Date`.

This PR fixes it with the new flag `BinaryConfiguration#ForceTimestamp`.
Currently existing `BinaryReflectiveSerializer#_forceTimestamp` becomes obsolete.

title: IGNITE-8884 .NET: Fix async key-val operations - use WriteObjectDetached
body:
Fix async cache operations when key and value objects reference each other or have references to the same object.
Async key-val operations used `WriteObject` instead `WriteObjectDetached`, so references to the same inner object were shared in the binary stream (referenced object is written once). However, cache stores key and val binary objects separately, so the reference to the inner object gets broken.

`WriteObjectDetached` disables reference sharing and writes both object independently.

title: IGNITE-13793: Implement SQLRowCount for SELECT
body:
SQLRowCount() should return estimation of row count of the query. Currently, we can not provide any estimations of this kind, but we still need to implement this function as sometimes some third-party software uses it. It is proposed to use some kind of constant value, e.g. page size.

title: GNITE-13835 : Improve discovery ducktape test to research small timeouts and behavior on large cluster.
body:
1)  Node id is now read from the log, not by remote JMX call. Faster, simpler, more reliable. JMX fails sometimes on small timeouts because node id is not published yet. Started node always prints its node id on info level.
2) `failure_detection_timeout` is now global variable with default value. To run cluster experiments with different settings and on various node count. 
3) Simplified await timeout on 'Node failure event'. Discovered sensitive delays on ssh, log reads and other non-manageable timeouts

title: IGNITE-13672 [ML]: Add initial JSON export/import support for all models
body:
This is a part of [Umbrella] Model export/import to PMML and custom JSON format](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/IGNITE-6642)

This PR implements model serialization to JSON and provides examples for each use-case.
14 models are supported

A few models has minor changes in fields naming, visibility and naming.

title: IGNITE-13760 .NET: Fix NullPointerException in GetAffinity on client nodes
body:
Cache context does not exist on client nodes unless `GetCache` was called, so `GridCacheAffinityManager` retrieval in `PlatformAffinity` constructor can cause NPE.

`GridCacheAffinityManager` was added to `PlatformAffinity` solely for Platform Cache needs and is not used otherwise, so it makes sense to move this functionality to a dedicated `PlatformAffinityManager` class. This fixes the bug, because cache context always exists by the time Platform Cache is created.
